House Bill/Resolution NO. HB04872
FULL TITLE : AN ACT INCREASING THE PENALTY OF RECLUSION TEMPORAL AND RECLUSION PERPETUA, AMENDING FOR THE PURPOSE ACT NO. 3815, OTHERWISE KNOWN AS THE REVISED PENAL CODE, AS AMENDED
ABSTRACT : Proposes that as an alternative to the death penalty, the penalties of reclusion temporal be increased from twelve years and one day to THIRTY YEARS and reclusion perpetua from thirty years and one day to FORTY YEARS
